title: This Website
desc: This is my first (of hopefully many) publicly served website, I wanted to challenge myself while building it so I went out of my comfort zone with it. You can view it he-oh wait a minute, you're already here!

title: Butterflies & Bees
desc: My first simple game featuring a ticketed enemy spawning system, third person controller and UI. It’s not a complex game but it’s my first.

title: Locker Theft Alarm
desc: In response to locker theft at RMIT, I designed an alarm system that triggers based on a difference in being moved and light synonymous with a locker being opened. In order to access the locker without triggering the alarm, the owner simply has to Bluetooth connect to the alarm.

title: RideShare Locking Mechanism
desc: As a part of a group project to create a rideshare platform, I was tasked with making a biometric login form, like any sane person with a Raspberry Pi B+ I made facial recognition and it was a nightmare. Despite the hardships of memory usage, I was able to get a working product using OpenCV and face-recognition python packages.
